title: Faber-Castell Pitt Monochrome 33 Piece Set
description:
The Pitt® Monochrome Sets are designed for the "mobile artist". This 33 piece set is handy and portable for sketches and studies using charcoal, graphite, artists pencils and crayons.

Contents Include: 2 Castell® 9000 Pencils: 2B, and 6B. 1 Graphite Aquarelle Pencil: 6B. 1 Pitt® Graphite Pure Pencil: 6B. 3 Pitt® Oil Base Pencils: Black Soft, Black Medium and Sanguine. 3 Oil-free Pitt® Pastel Pencils: White Medium, Walnut Brown and Black. 10 Pitt® Pastels: White Soft, White Medium, Sanguine Burnt, Sanguine Medium Raw, Bistre, van Dyck Brown, Roman Sepia, Umber, Black Medium Burnt and Black Soft Burnt. 4 Pitt Compressed Charcoal Sticks: Extra Soft, Soft, Medium and Hard. 4 Natural Pitt® Charcoal Sticks5-11mm. 1 Natural Pitt® Charcoal Pencil: Medium. 1 Pressed Pitt® Charcoal Pencil: Soft. 1 Kneadable Art Eraser, 1 Paper Wiper and 1 Water Brush in a metal tin.

12.88 in. x .75 in. x 7.88 in.
